Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Policy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how GDG on Campus MUST collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: GDG on Campus MUST ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, attend our events, or engage with our community.
introduction.content2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or participate in our events.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.item1: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
personalInfo.item3: Professional information (area of study, interests, skills)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.item1: Organize and manage events, workshops, and community activities
howWeUse.item2: Send notifications about upcoming events and opportunities
howWeUse.item3: Communicate with members about GDG activities and news
howWeUse.item4: Improve our website and services based on user feedback
howWeUse.item5: Maintain membership records and community engagement
howWeUse.item6: Comply with university policies and Google Developer Group guidelines

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content1: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
informationSharing.item1: With Google LLC for GDG program administration and reporting
informationSharing.item2: With event partners and sponsors (only with your explicit consent)
informationSharing.item3: With university administration when required for campus activities
informationSharing.item4: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
dataSecurity.content2: However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.item1: Access and review your personal information
yourRights.item2: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
yourRights.item3: Request deletion of your personal information
yourRights.item5: Withdraw consent for data processing (where applicable)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content1: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and understand where our visitors are coming from.
cookies.content2: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content1: Our website may contain links to third-party services or integrate with external platforms. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external services:

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.fullAddress: BZD, 22th khoroo, School of Information and Telecommunication Technology, Ulaanbaatar, 13341, Mongolia

international.title: International Users and GDPR Compliance
international.content1: If you are accessing our services from outside Mongolia, please note that your information may be transferred to and processed in Mongolia where our servers are located.
international.content2: For users in the European Union, we comply with GDPR requirements and respect your rights regarding personal data processing.
